The error message below indicates that a unit test has failed.  
Unfortunately you won't be able to tell which unit test without going  
through the full build output looking for the name of the test class  
that failed. You're looking for something under the "test:test"  
banner that says something like

  [junit] Test run: x, Failures: y, Errors: z, Time elapsed: w

...where y or z is nonzero.

Are you building a release or the latest trunk? Do you have code that  
you added that may be causing a test to fail? Also, what build  
targets are you specifying at the command line?

-Paul
